title: CDC removes guidance for phasing out masks in schools, say it's 'always being revised'
content:
1. CDC removes guidance for phasing out masks in schools, say it's 'always being revised'  New York Post
  2. Masks in school help prevent Covid-19 outbreaks and spread, CDC studies find  CNN
  3. As Florida punishes schools, study finds masks cut school COVID outbreaks 3.5X  Ars Technica
  4. The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention published three reports that provide evidence that masking can help cut transmission of coronavirus within schools.  The Washington Post
  5. WHO's Science in 5 on COVID-19 : Keeping schools safe  World Health Organization (WHO)
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
CDC removes guidance for phasing out masks in schools, say it's 'always being revised'  New York Post 
Masks in school help prevent Covid-19 outbreaks and spread, CDC studies find  CNN
As Florida punishes schools, study finds masks cut school COVID outbreaks 3.5X  Ars Technica
The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention published three reports that provide evidence that masking can help cut transmission of coronavirus within schools.  The Washington Post
WHO's Science in 5 on COVID-19 : Keeping schools safe  World Health Organization (WHO)
View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: CDC、学校でのマスクの段階的廃止のガイダンスを削除、「常に改訂されている」と語る
疾病预防控制中心取消了关于在学校逐步淘汰口罩的指导意见，称其 "一直在修订中
